title: The Witcher 3 (1.03 Patch) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here the latest patch for The Witcher 3. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.

The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Patch 1.03 changelog:


Ã¢â€”ï¿½Improves stability in gameplay and the UI

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Improves performance especially in cutscenes and gameplay

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixes grass and foiliage popping that can occur after density parameters change

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Improves Nvidia Hairworks performance

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Boosted texture anisotropy sampling to 16x on Ultra preset

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Sharpen Postprocess settings extended from Off/On to Off/Normal/High

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Improves menu handling

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Improves input responsiveness when using keyboard

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Corrects an issue with stamina regeneration while sprinting

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixes a cursor lock issue that sometimes occurs when scrolling the map

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Generally improves world map focus

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Corrects a bug where player was able to fire bolts at friendly NPCs

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Corrects an issue in dialog selections

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Corrects some missing translations in the UI

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Minor SFX improvements -Blood particles will now properly appear after killing 

Ã¢â€”ï¿½enemies on the water

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Rostan Muggs is back

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Adds Japanese language support (text and voice-over)

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Adds Korean language support (text only)
